text: Musul'manam nenavistno srazheniye v zapretnyye mesyatsy, poetomu oni sprashivayut tebya (o Mukhammad!): "Nuzhno li vesti srazheniye v zapretnyye mesyatsy?" Skazhi im, chto vesti voynu v zapretnyye mesyatsy - bol'shoy grekh, no otkloneniye lyudey ot very v Nego i ot Zapretnoy mecheti, izgnaniye poseshchayushchikh yeyo veruyushchikh v Allakha i izgnaniye musul'man iz Mekki, kak delali vashi vragi, - yeshcho bol'shiy grekh pered Allakhom. Oni prichinili musul'manam vred, chtoby otvratit' ikh ot islamskoy religii. A eto - bol'she, chem ubiystvo. Poetomu, srazheniye v zapretnyye mesyatsy razreshayetsya, chtoby ostanovit' takogo roda zlo. O musul'mane, eti lyudi nespravedlivy, i oni, ne prinimaya vashey logiki i spravedlivosti, budut srazhat'sya s vami, poka ne otvratyat vas ot vashey religii, yesli smogut. A blagorodnyye deyaniya tekh iz vas, kto oslabeyet ot ikh atak, otvratitsya ot very i umrot nevernym, stanut tshchetnymi v blizhayshey i v budushchey zhizni. Eti - obitateli ognya, oni v nom ostanutsya navechno
